description:
Guide the stick figures running about the blackboard to the finish line!
You can scrawl chalk lines directly onto the screen by using the touch controls!
Don't go falling into holes or getting skewered by spikes!
Get the party going with friends and family! Up to 4 people can play in battle mode at once!
Become the chalk master you always knew you could!

[Handheld Mode]
Progress through this mode by clearing each stage, one at a time.
Chalk lines will appear under your fingers as you touch and swipe the screen.
Guide the stick figures with masterful chalk patterns.
Over 10 individual areas, such as forests and snowy mountains, await!

[TV/Tabletop Mode]
1-4 players
Jump and dash all the way to the goal!
Knock your rivals out of the running, or join forces to press forward!
Chalk it up in wild battles with your friends!
name: Chalk Dash Carnival
